name: Revival of the Middle Kingdom
description:
This project was created for Historically Accurate Game Jam 4.

 We were inspired by the culture of the East and decided to create a game-metaphor for one of the Chinese myths. We will tell you a story, your task will be to find a solution to the situation and guess how Fusi achieved his goal. Enjoy! 

 A little about controls: 

-A and D to walk

- Mouse click/space to skip cutscene (don't worry, they are small)  

- Escape to exit the game

Reminder: This game has an ending, try to think about the direction;)
